meanings.definition: Equipped with an excessive amount of weapons.
meanings.sent1: The overarmed soldier struggled to move quickly due to the heavy load of weapons.
meanings.sent2: The overarmed pirate ship struck fear into the hearts of all who saw it.
meanings.sent3: The overarmed knight looked more like a walking armory than a warrior.
meanings.sent4: The overarmed fortress stood as an impenetrable barrier against any enemy.
meanings.sent5: The overarmed police officer seemed ready for any possible threat.

meanings.definition: To provide with an excessive amount of weapons.
meanings.sent1: The general decided to overarmed his troops for the upcoming battle.
meanings.sent2: The arms dealer was known for overarming his clients, regardless of their actual needs.
meanings.sent3: The eccentric inventor loved to overarmed his robots with all sorts of gadgets.
meanings.sent4: The coach warned against overarming the players with too many strategies at once.
meanings.sent5: The parents chose to overarmed their children with knowledge and love for a bright future.
